ANIMATED_BANNER.description: Ability to upload an animated banner image that will display above the channel list.

ANIMATED_ICON.description: Ability to upload an animated icon, similar to animated profile pictures for Nitro members. Displays on hover and invite links on desktop, and plays constantly on mobile.

APPLICATION_COMMAND_PERMISSIONS_V2.description: Guild has opted-in to the new Application Command Permission logic before it was applied to all servers.

AUTO_MODERATION.description: Guild has set up auto moderation rules

AUTOMOD_TRIGGER_ML_SPAM_FILTER.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2022-03_automod_trigger_ml_spam_filter experiment overrides

AUTOMOD_TRIGGER_USER_PROFILE.description: Server has enabled AutoMod for user profiles.

BANNER.description: Ability to set a banner image that will display above the channel list.

BFG.description: Internally documented as big funky guild

BOT_DEVELOPER_EARLY_ACCESS.description: Enables early access features for bot and library developers.

BURST_REACTIONS.description: Enables burst reactions for the guild

CLYDE_DISABLED.description: Given when a server administrator disables ClydeAI for the guild

COMMUNITY.description: Gain access to Server Discovery, Insights, Community Server News, and Announcement Channels.

CREATOR_ACCEPTED_NEW_TERMS.description: The server owner accepted the new monetization terms.

CREATOR_MONETIZABLE.description: Given to guilds that enabled role subscriptions through the manual approval system

DEVELOPER_SUPPORT_SERVER.description: Given to guilds that are set as the support server in App Directory.

DISCOVERABLE_DISABLED.description: Guild is permanently removed from Discovery by Discord.

ENABLED_DISCOVERABLE_BEFORE.description: Given to servers that have enabled Discovery at any point.

ENABLED_MODERATION_EXPERIENCE_FOR_NON_CO.description: Moves the member list from the guild settings to the member tab for non-community guilds.

EXPOSED_TO_ACTIVITIES_WTP_EXPERIMENT.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2021-11_activities_baseline_engagement_bundle experiment overrides

GUILD_AUTOMOD_DEFAULT_LIST.description: Given to guilds in the 2022-03_guild_automod_default_list experiment overrides

GUILD_COMMUNICATION_DISABLED_GUILDS.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2021-11_guild_communication_disabled_guilds experiment overrides

GUILD_HOME_OVERRIDE.description: Gives the guild access to the Home feature, enables Treatment 2 of the 2022-01_home_tab_guild experiment overrides

GUILD_HOME_TEST.description: Gives the guild access to the Home feature, enables Treatment 1 of the 2022-01_home_tab_guild experiment

GUILD_MEMBER_VERIFICATION_EXPERIMENT.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2021-11_member_verification_manual_approval experiment

GUILD_PRODUCTS.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2023-04_server_products experiment overrides

GUILD_ROLE_SUBSCRIPTIONS.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2021-06_guild_role_subscriptions experiment overrides

GUILD_ROLE_SUBSCRIPTION_PURCHASE_FEEDBAC.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2022-05_mobile_web_role_subscription_purchase_page experiment overrides

GUILD_ROLE_SUBSCRIPTION_TRIALS.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2022-01_guild_role_subscription_trials experiment overrides

HAD_EARLY_ACTIVITIES_ACCESS.description: Server previously had access to voice channel activities and can bypass the boost level requirement

HAS_DIRECTORY_ENTRY.description: Guild is in a directory channel.

HUB.description: Student Hubs contain a directory channel that let you find school-related, student-run servers for your school or university.

INCREASED_THREAD_LIMIT.description: Allows the server to have 1,000+ active threads

INTERNAL_EMPLOYEE_ONLY.description: Restricts the guild so that only users with the staff flag can join.

INVITE_SPLASH.description: Ability to set a background image that will display on all invite links.

INVITES_DISABLED.description: Prevents new members from joining and shows an error when attemping to join the server.

MEMBER_PROFILES.description: Allows members to customize their avatar, banner and bio for that server.

MEMBER_SAFETY_PAGE_ROLLOUT.description: Assigns the experiment of the Member Safety panel and lockdowns to the guild

MEMBER_VERIFICATION_GATE_ENABLED.description: Has member verification gate enabled, requiring new users to pass the verification gate before interacting with the server.

MOBILE_WEB_ROLE_SUBSCRIPTION_PURCHASE_PA.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2022-05_mobile_web_role_subscription_purchase_page experiment overrides

MONETIZATION_ENABLED.description: Allows the server to set a team in dev portal to receive role subscription payouts

MORE_EMOJI.description: Adds 150 extra emoji slots to each category (normal and animated emoji). Not used in server boosting.

MORE_STICKERS.description: Adds 60 total sticker slots no matter how many it had before. Not used in server boosting.

NEWS.description: Ability to create and use news announcement channels which can be followed, and shows the Announcements analytics tab in the guild settings.

NON_COMMUNITY_RAID_ALERTS.description: Non-community guild is opt-in to raid alerts

PARTNERED.description: Partner badge near the server name and in mutual server lists.

PREMIUM_TIER_3_OVERRIDE.description: Forces the server to server boosting level 3

PREVIEW_ENABLED.description: Allows a user to view the server without passing membership gating.

PRODUCTS_AVAILABLE_FOR_PURCHASE.description: Guild has server products available for purchase

RAID_ALERTS_DISABLED.description: Guild is opt-out from raid alerts

RELAY_ENABLED.description: Shards connections to the guild to different nodes that relay information between each other.

ROLE_ICONS.description: Ability to set an image or emoji as a role icon.

ROLE_SUBSCRIPTIONS_AVAILABLE_FOR_PURCHAS.description: Allows servers members to purchase role subscriptions.

ROLE_SUBSCRIPTIONS_ENABLED.description: Ability to view and manage role subscriptions.

SHARED_CANVAS_FRIENDS_AND_FAMILY_TEST.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2023-01_shared_canvas experiment overrides

SOUNDBOARD.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2021-12_soundboard experiment overrides

SUMMARIES_ENABLED.description: Given to guilds in the 2023-02_p13n_summarization experiment overrides

SUMMARIES_ENABLED_GA.description: Given to guilds in the 2023-02_p13n_summarization experiment overrides

TEXT_IN_VOICE_ENABLED.description: Show a chat button inside voice channels that opens a dedicated text channel in a sidebar similar to thread view.

THREADS_ENABLED_TESTING.description: Used by bot developers to test their bots with threads in guilds with 5 or less members and a bot. Also gives the premium thread features.

THREAD_DEFAULT_AUTO_ARCHIVE_DURATION.description: Unknown, presumably used for testing changes to the thread default auto archive duration.

THREADS_ONLY_CHANNEL.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2021-07_threads_only_channel experiment overrides

TICKETED_EVENTS_ENABLED.description: Ability to view and manage ticketed events.

TIERLESS_BOOSTING.description: Ability to use the new boosting system, which includes Server Tags and `Enhanced Role Styles

TIERLESS_BOOSTING_CLIENT_TEST.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2025-02_skill_trees experiment overrides

TIERLESS_BOOSTING_TEST.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2025-02_skill_trees experiment overrides

VANITY_URL.description: Ability to set a vanity URL (custom discord.gg invite link).

VERIFIED.description: Verification checkmark near the server name and in mutual server lists.

VIP_REGIONS.description: Ability to use special voice regions with better stability: US East VIP, US West VIP, and Amsterdam VIP. Deprecated, replaced with 384kbps max bitrate

VOICE_CHANNEL_EFFECTS.description: Given to guilds previously in the 2022-06_voice_channel_effects experiment overrides

WELCOME_SCREEN_ENABLED.description: Has welcome screen enabled, a modal shown to new joiners that features different channels, and a short description of the guild.

FORWARDING_DISABLED.description: Blocks from the API and UX side ability to forward messages from the selected server.

CHANNEL_BANNER.description: Ability to set a channel banner that will display above the Channel Information sidebar.

CLAN.description: The server is a clan server

COMMERCE.description: Ability to create and use store channels.

FEATURABLE.description: Previously used to control which servers were displayed under the 'Featured' category in Discovery

FORCE_RELAY.description: Shards connections to the guild to different nodes that relay information between each other.

MEMBER_LIST_DISABLED.description: Created for the Fortnite server blackout event on Oct 13, 2019, when viewing the member list it would show 'There's nothing to see here.'.

PRIVATE_THREADS.description: Ability to create private threads. Is now a base feature.

RAID_ALERTS_ENABLED.description: Deprecated in favor of RAID_ALERTS_DISABLED since Discord switched to an opt-out system.

SEVEN_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE.description: Ability to use seven-day archive time for threads.

THREE_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE.description: Ability to use three-day archive time for threads.
